subject: Re: Order #SSN3435 confirmed
description_text:
Hello, good day. I just made this purchase. I wanted to ask if it's
possible to have the invoice issued at half price, so I don't have to pay
so much import tax when it enters my country (Argentina). Thank you,
regards.


Juan Martin.

conversations.body_text: Hi Juan Martin Garaicoechea,  Okay, ​​we'll declare the amount as $45 for you. Is that acceptable?

Hi friend. Perhaps it's too low and suspicious. Let's say between 70 and
100; that will be more believable. Otherwise, the shipping cost would be
higher than the product.

Once everything is done, send me a picture of how it looks so I can declare
the same amount when it arrives. Thank you very much.

El jue, 13 nov 2025 a las 8:19, service@simsonn.com (
Hi Juan Martin Garaicoechea,    Okay, the declared amount is $79.

Thank you very much

Juan Martin.
